task_prompt: 打开电脑里的浏览器，进入https://cn.bing.com，搜索"Birthday song lyrics"，打开第一个网页，把歌词复制到记事本，并把记事本文件命名为lyrics
send_prompt:
您对 Linux 操作系统非常熟悉。您的任务是操作计算机屏幕，给出完成任务的计划。
您能看到一个计算机屏幕，高度：768，宽度：1024，当前任务为"打开电脑里的浏览器，进入https://cn.bing.com，搜索"Birthday song lyrics"，打开第一个网页，把歌词复制到记事本，并把记事本文件命名为lyrics"，您需要给出完成该目标的计划。
请以 json 格式输出您的计划，例如，我的任务是在网络上搜索“麦田怪圈是怎么回事”，此任务的拆解步骤是：
```json 
[
    {"action_type":"PlanAction","element":"打开浏览器"},
    {"action_type":"PlanAction","element":"在浏览器中搜索“麦田怪圈是怎么回事”"},
    {"action_type":"PlanAction","element":"打开第一个搜索结果"},
    {"action_type":"PlanAction","element":"浏览网页内容"},
    {"action_type":"PlanAction","element":"根据内容回答“麦田怪圈是怎么回事”"}
]
```

另一个例子，我的任务是“在笔记本中写一段关于人工智能的简介”，此任务的拆解步骤是：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"PlanAction","element":"打开笔记本"},
    {"action_type":"PlanAction","element":"在笔记本中写一段关于人工智能的简介"}
]
```


现在，您的当前任务是 "打开电脑里的浏览器，进入https://cn.bing.com，搜索"Birthday song lyrics"，打开第一个网页，把歌词复制到记事本，并把记事本文件命名为lyrics"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出任务的拆解步骤。
task_prompt_en: Open the browser in the computer and enter https://cn.bing.com , search "Birthday song lyrics", open the first webpage, copy the lyrics to Notepad, and name the Notepad file lyrics
task_prompt_zh: 打开电脑里的浏览器，进入https://cn.bing.com，搜索"Birthday song lyrics"，打开第一个网页，把歌词复制到记事本，并把记事本文件命名为lyrics
send_prompt_en:
You are familiar with the Linux operating system. Your task is to operate the computer screen and give a plan to complete the task.
You can see a computer screen with a height of 768 and a width of 1024. The current task is "Open the browser in the computer, enter https://cn.bing.com , search for "Birthday song lyrics", open the first webpage, copy the lyrics to Notepad, and name the Notepad file "lyrics". You need to give a plan to complete this goal.
Please output your plan in json format. For example, my task is to search the Internet for "What's wrong with crop circles?" The disassembly steps of this task are:```json
[
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Open Browser"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Search the browser for \"What's wrong with crop circles?\""},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Open the first search result"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Browse web content"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Answer \"What's wrong with crop circles\" according to the content"}
]
```Another example, my task is to "write a brief introduction to AI in my notebook". The disassembly steps of this task are:```json
[
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Open Notebook"},
    {"action_type": "PlanAction", "element": "Write a brief introduction to AI in your notebook"}
]
```Now, your current task is "Open the browser in the computer, enter https://cn.bing.com , search for "Birthday song lyrics", open the first webpage, copy the lyrics to Notepad, and name the Notepad file "lyrics". Please give the disassembly steps of the task according to the status of the existing screen image.

actions.element: 打开记事本并粘贴复制的内容

    {"action_type":"PlanAction","element":"Open Notepad and paste the copied content"},
